name: hoop.dev
headline: Code review for DevOps tasks
description: hoop.dev prevents developers from blocking on Devops tasks. We do this by enabling any engineer do Devops work under the supervision of the Devops team. You can think of us as code review for Devops tasks.

founders.name: Andrios Robert, Founder
founders.description: Andrios is a solo founder with a Computer Science degree. He helped grow a fintech as the second engineer to Series B, millions of customers, and hundreds of developers. He also worked as an engineer at multiple Fortune 500 companies.
